org.apache.polygene.api.serialization

Class Serializer.Options.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.polygene.api.serialization.Serializer.Options.Builder
  • Enclosing interface:
    Serializer.Options

    public static final class Serializer.Options.Builder
extends Object
    Builder for Serializer.Options. This builder is mutable, built instances are not.

      • withNestedTypeInfo

        public Serializer.Options.Builder withNestedTypeInfo()
        Include type information in the serialized form of nested values.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withoutNestedTypeInfo

        public Serializer.Options.Builder withoutNestedTypeInfo()
        Do not include type information in the serialized form of nested values. WARNING Without this, Deserializers will use the provided ValueType for instantiation potentially breaking polymorphism, see Serializer.Options.nestedTypeInfo().
        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        withNestedTypeInfo()

        value - it's value

        Returns:

      • build

        public Serializer.Options build()
        Build the options.
        Returns:
        a new immutable instance of Serializer.Options.
